page.title: 04TRANSPORT
page.content: {ROADS }Lutterworth sits in a triangle of three motorways:M69 to the NW,M6 to the SW,M1 to the East.Because of Lutterworth's central position in the UK and its close proximity to motorways and other main routes,it is developing into an important storage and distribution centre. {RAIL} The nearest mainline link to Lutterworth is Rugby Midland Station,London Euston being 55 minutes away.This line gives access to virtually all parts of the country. {OTHER}No canal facility is in the immediate vicinity of Lutterworth.A disused airfield lies to the West of the town.
